segment.content:
As part of my work placement at PERSU SUNİ DERİ, I was engaged in any of the many
components comprising production planning and control for the good for the company,
PERSU Suni Deri. PERSU PRACTICES , COVERS it pertains to the production of artificial leather
which involves a composition of available resources, materials and time to create a production
cycle efficiently. The bulk of engineering activity in the company includes resource
distribution, constructing a production plan, inventory control and design improvement to
fulfill customer needs while upholding top quality products and services.
In the course of the internship, I worked hand in hand with one business engineer, with his
assistance and supervision I performed production planning and controls. It was about the
time when I took the main functions to help create the outlines of the production schedule,
assess stock, optimize working processes, and organize efficient production of goods. I,
nevertheless, participated in data collection and analysis of production processes, which
included identifying potential areas of improvement. Also, I assisted in quality assurance
activities for artificial leather products produced by the firm in order for the products to meet
desired quality.
Before I embarked on the internship, I believed I would get hands-on experience in practical
application of the knowledge gained in the course units in Manufacturing Systems, Operations
Research, and Operations and Facilities Design. To get an idea, I was also looking to see how
production planning is done in the real manufacturing space. The results of the internship in
the real world were even better than I had anticipated. Not only did I acquire the knowledge
in the different technical aspects of production planning but I also built great problem-solving
capabilities and know how to work effectively in cross-disciplinary teams.
As I have mentioned earlier, this experience helped me to understand production
management in practice. I was able to effectively use the knowledge of the ‘Probability and
Statistics’ course in order to track production processes and propose changes to make them
more effective. Furthermore, my rapport and presentation skills developed from Technical
Report Writing, enabled me to document and present my work to the superiors effectively.
All in all, this internship enabled me to make use of the classroom knowledge in practice and
this way prepared me for industrial engineering and production management careers in the
future.

score.feedback: Özet, şirketin faaliyetlerini, staj aktivitelerini, beklentileri ve sonuçları ile öğrenilenleri kapsıyor. Şirketin mühendislik faaliyetleri ve staj sırasında yapılan görevler hakkında somut örnekler verilmiş. Beklentiler ve sonuçlar karşılaştırılmış, öğrenilen noktalar belirtilmiş. Metin, genel olarak spesifik ve anlaşılır bilgiler içeriyor.
